Address.Address1: 23/2-3 Sukhumvit 13, Sukhumvit Road, Klongtoey Nua, Wattana

Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Radisson Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit in Bangkok (Sukhumvit), you'll be minutes from Embassy of Pakistan and close to Pratunam Market. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Bumrungrad Hospital and Terminal 21 Shopping Mall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 150 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with separate bathtubs and showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a fitness center. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and a computer station. Planning an event in Bangkok? This hotel has 2367 square feet (220 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Embassy of Pakistan - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bumrungrad Hospital - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Terminal 21 Shopping Mall - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Embassy of India - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Embassy of Switzerland - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Embassy of Argentina - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Embassy of the United Kingdom - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Central Embassy - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Central Chidlom Department Store - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Embassy of the United States - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Benjakiti Park - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Fortune Town Mall - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Central Plaza Grand Rama 9 - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Amarin Plaza - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Benjasiri Park - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The preferred airport for Radisson Suites Bangkok Sukhumvit is Bangkok (BKK-Suvarnabhumi Intl.) - 21.7 km / 13.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
